definition: to try to find/to look for/to call on sb/to find/to seek/to return/to give change
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: And you will find the healing you need.
sentences.chinese: 而你將會找回你尋找的那份寧靜。

sentences.english: At least I still have the pieces that were bitten off.
sentences.chinese: 但至少我還是找回了被咬掉的那兩隻耳朵。

sentences.english: Be able to get back at the right hand fork again?
sentences.chinese: 能找回那個分岔口再次牽手嗎？

sentences.english: You will be asked for the answer to your secret question if you forget your password.
sentences.chinese: 如果忘記密碼，可以通過回答提示問題找回密碼。

sentences.english: How do you find a thing you have mislaid or forgotten?
sentences.chinese: 你如何找回你已經錯失或遺忘的東西哩？

sentences.english: She didn't stir at all when she got back her wedding ring.
sentences.chinese: 找回她的結婚戒指，她一點兒也不激動。

sentences.english: In the end, however, they recovered only 43 messages.
sentences.chinese: 不過，最後他們也只是找回了43條訊息。

sentences.english: I spoke of trying to find myself in the writings in my journal.
sentences.chinese: 我跟他說了自己嘗試通過給雜誌寫作來找回自己。

sentences.english: I find my lost youth again.
sentences.chinese: 我又找回了失去的青春。

sentences.english: Leaf GongJin rediscovered the briefcase, but there is in a cloud of hair impeach him.
sentences.chinese: 葉公瑾找回了公文包，但裏頭有份程雲發檢舉他的信。

sentences.english: If you forget your password, you can use the link provided to reset your password.
sentences.chinese: 假如您忘記密碼，可透過提供的連結找回密碼。

sentences.english: Some criticisms are constructive and will help you find your voice.
sentences.chinese: 有些批評是很有建設性的，可以幫助你找回你自己。

sentences.english: Shopping on internet after found back passwords.
sentences.chinese: 找回銀行密碼之後又開始網購。

sentences.english: But they still couldn't get me through the roughest patches.
sentences.chinese: 但我仍然不能通過這粗糙的修飾來找回自信。

sentences.english: Friends contact sceptre too, let him to the airport to find love.
sentences.chinese: 友田馬上聯繫了圭太，讓他到機場找回繪戀。

sentences.english: Yao Ming found his form in the 3rd quarter to help the Rockets extend their lead.
sentences.chinese: 姚明在第三節找回狀態帶領火箭隊擴大了領先優勢。

definition: to pick up (a theme etc)/to regain (confidence)/to revive (a custom, friendship etc)
to recover (sth lost or stolen)/to get back
to lose/to throw away/to discard/to cast away
to look for/to seek/to find fault
to lose sth and then regain it (idiom)
